name: GFE Media GmbH
description:
GFE Media supports companies all over Europe in transforming their classic business processes into smart online solutions. As an early online agency - back in in 2001 - taming dinosaurs like OS-Commerce, XTC and Magento1, GFE is now specialized in a custom, PIM- and E-Commerce development, with experience in fancy environments with countless ERP-, CRM-, CMS-, DMS interfaces and many successfully „onlined" clients.
Besides the Headquarter in Göppingen/Stuttgart, GFE runs an office in Hamburg, supporting SMB's in their effort to manage their product information in a  modern way and keep up with "Industrie 4.0“. 
READ MORE...
